name: Crown Bonded Performance Fleece Pullover - Men's

features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Dryride Mist-Defy DWR fabric repels water while staying soft, stretchy, and comfortable
Polyester fleece bonded with 100% recycled polyester fleece backer
Stretch back panel for easy movement
Attached hood with drawcord, Stretch cuffs and hem
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
